title: Capsule.
body: Hello I got Honor level 3  i didnt get any Capsule. All my friends got their but only i didnt get atleast 1

replies.body: Level 3 Honor enables the chance to drop capsules.  You don't get a free one upon reaching level 3, so you'll have to continue playing games for that chance.  Hope that helps clear things up, and congrats on your progress!
